name: Sugar Line
description:
The best casual puzzle game with the new version of sugar definition is coming up! Draw your finger directly to tap on 2 or more candies of the same on the screen to burst, use power-ups and boosters smartly to step up you game. Take on the sugar paradise alone or compete with your friends for the highest score!

Features:
- 150 amazing levels and more to come
- Walk through 5 delicately gorgeous scenes in this completely new hit puzzle adventure
- Collect lollipops and cookies for the tough levels
- Challenging obstacles: Candy bar, Twinkies, Sweets, etc.
- Wonderful BGM and cool animation effects
- Support all android devices with super small size to download
- Never ending fun for all ages

Download Sugar Line in Google Play for FREE now and enjoy the unstoppable pleasure!
